vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
οὐαί,
exclamation of pain and anger, ah! woe! with nominative, [LXX], woe is me! woe to thee![LXX+2nd c.AD+]
__II οὐαί· φυλαί [Refs 5th c.AD+]
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
woe!, how dreadful!, alas!
Wo! Alas! How dreadful!, Mt. 11:21; 18:7; 23:13, 14, 15, 16; ἡ οὐαι, substantive, a woe, calamity, Rev. 9:12; 11:14
vocabInfos._es_Definition: (1) interj. ¡cuán terrible será! (2) f sustantivo: horror, desastre, calamidad
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) (表達痛苦不悅的驚嘆) 啊! 禍哉!
2) 禍患
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) (表达痛苦不悦的惊叹) 啊! 祸哉!
2) 祸患
